title: Strictly Come Dancing Week 6: who danced it best?
text:
With a couple of spook-tacular exceptions, Strictly’s Halloween show missed the mark this year. Scarily bad music choices hampered the dancers, while the judges’ frightening scores – once again, over-rewarding improvement in the weaker dancers – skewed the leaderboard.

The nation’s new cult hero, South African pro Johannes Radebe, and his promising partner Catherine Tyldesley were the Fright Night sacrifice.

Yes, her cha cha lacked strong leg and foot action, and the performance was inconsistent, but she was scored harshly compared with others.

They lost out in the dance-off to Mike “Nightmare Bunny” Bushell. His tango was certainly an improvement on last week’s guest judge-pandering samba –...
description: With a couple of spook-tacular exceptions, Strictly’s Halloween show missed the mark this year.
